      • flashBoard

        public static Jocd.ErrorCode flashBoard(java.lang.String file,
                                        br.org.certi.jocd.tools.ProgressUpdateInterface progressUpdate,
                                        java.lang.String uniqueId)
        Flashes the specified file in the board specified by the provided unique ID.
        Parameters:
        file - filepath of the file that should be flashed.
        progressUpdate - callback interface for reporting flashing progress update.
        uniqueId - board unique ID where to flash file. If null it will search for the connected. devices and choose the first one.
        Returns:
        the error code of the flash operation.
